===================
Welcome to positive
===================

Low level algorithms for data manipulation.


------------
Installation
------------

To install positive simple use `pip`

::

    $ pip install positive


-------
License
-------

positive is released under the
`MIT license <https://github.com/llondon6/positive/blob/master/LICENSE>`_.
